    Antique Kitchen Stone Trough Sinks

ARE YOU DRAWN TO OUR ANTIQUE STONE SINKS?

THEN PLEASE CALL US TODAY AT: (212) 461-0245

OR EMAIL US AT: SALES@ANCIENTSURFACES.COM

 

  • OLD-SINKS.COM is your source for all antique powder room stone sinks, kitchen trought sinks and backsplash stones, master bathroom shower stones, salvaged 17th and 18th century faucettes, ancient thick countertop limestone slabs and much more. Captivate yourself everytime you walk into your customized kitchen or bathroom. Having set the industry standard time and time again, quality and craftsmanship have never been subject to compromise when it come down to our passionatly restored or hand carved sinks. Each stone carved sink is a unique creation hand hewed with attention and detail throughout. Intricate architectural details, brilliant stone colors finished with an unrivaled old world finishing and styling are all part of the vision our mother company 'Ancient Surfaces' has put into their restoration work.
